titleStmt.title: A review of the Covenant, wherein the originall, grounds, means, matter, and ends of it are examined: and out of the principles of the remonstrances, declarations, votes, orders, and ordinances of the prime covenanteers, or the firmer grounds of Scripture, law, and reason, disproved.
titleStmt.author: Langbaine, Gerard, 1609-1658.

notesStmt.note: Anonymous. By Gerard Langbaine, the elder.
Printer's name and place of publication from Wing.
Wing has publication year 1644[5]; Madan has Jan? 1644/5; but Thomason catalogue lists under 1644.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "said to be printed at Bristoll"; "July 22".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
